SEARCH
Package hms.users

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
hms.users.User
hms.users.Patient
public class Patient extends User
Represents a patient within the hospital management system. This class extends the User class, adding specific attributes and methods relevant to a patient's interactions and records in the system.

    • Patient

      public Patient(String patientID, String name, String gender, int age, LocalDate birth, int contactNumber, String email, String bloodType)
      Constructor for creating a new patient with detailed information.
      Parameters:
      patientID - Unique identifier for the patient.
      name - Name of the patient.
      gender - Gender of the patient.
      age - Age of the patient.
      birth - Date of birth of the patient.
      contactNumber - Contact number of the patient.
      email - Email address of the patient.
      bloodType - Blood type of the patient.

      Returns:
      A new Patient object populated with the data from the CSV string.

    • getPastDiagnoses

      public PastDiagnoses getPastDiagnoses()
      Gets the past diagnoses of the patient. This method ensures the past diagnoses list is populated based on the patient's appointment history.
      Returns:
      The PastDiagnoses object containing the list of past diagnoses.

    • getTimeTable

      public List<Appointment> getTimeTable()
      Gets the timetable of appointments for the patient. This method ensures the timetable is populated if it is currently empty.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the patient's appointments.

    • updateTimeTable

      public List<Appointment> updateTimeTable()
      Updates the patient's appointment timetable by fetching the latest list of appointments from the data source. This method ensures that the patient's timetable reflects any changes or new appointments that have been added since the last update.
      Returns:
      The updated list of appointments for the patient.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Adds a new appointment to the patient's appointment timetable. This method allows for the direct insertion of an appointment into the patient's current list of appointments without needing to fetch the entire list from the data source again.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment object to be added to the timetable. This appointment should contain all necessary details such as the date, time, and status.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getScheduledAppointments()
      Gets a list of scheduled appointments for the patient. Scheduled appointments include only those with statuses 'pending' and 'confirmed'.
      Returns:
      A list of scheduled Appointment objects.

    • getPatients

      public static List<Patient> getPatients()
      Retrieves a list of all patients from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all patients.

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays patient's details including the extended attributes like blood type and contact information.
      Overrides:
      display in class User

    • getPatient

      public static Patient getPatient(List<Patient> patients)
      Static method to select a Patient from a list of patients.
      Parameters:
      patients - A list of patients to select from.
      Returns:
      The selected patient.

    • getByID

      public static Patient getByID(String patientID)
      Retrieves a Patient object by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      The Patient object if found, otherwise null.
